title: 17 Questions About ‘Mortal Kombat’ and the Worst Video Game Movies Ever
description:
Today, we discuss Fatalities and Flawless Victories. Which one was the new adaptation of the beloved video game franchise ‘Mortal Kombat’? Joining Sean to answer that question and many more about all things video game movies are Ringer staff writers and avowed gamers Justin Charity and Ben Lindbergh.

Host: Sean Fennessey
Guests: Justin Charity and Ben Lindbergh
Producer: Bobby Wagner
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
